description: A bar in Water 7 operated by Blueno, who is secretly a CP9 agent. The bar serves as a meeting place for various Water 7 residents.

keyEvents.title: Kokoro Reveals CP9's Existence
keyEvents.description: At Blueno's Bar, Kokoro tells Franky about CP9, revealing they are the true culprits behind Iceburg's attack.
keyEvents.significance: The bar serves as the location where crucial information about CP9 is revealed to Franky, advancing the plot.

keyEvents.title: Franky's Conversation About the Typhoon
keyEvents.description: Kokoro and Franky discuss preparing for the approaching typhoon, revealing Franky has no home.
keyEvents.significance: A character-building moment at the bar that adds depth to Franky's situation.

description: A water city known for its shipbuilding industry, built on a series of canals and waterways. The city is vulnerable to flooding, especially during typhoons.

keyEvents.title: Approaching Typhoon Warning
keyEvents.description: Nami recognizes that a typhoon is approaching Water 7, identifying flooding as the city's primary vulnerability.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the environmental threat that compounds the crew's problems during this arc.

keyEvents.title: Robin's Secret Meeting with CP9
keyEvents.description: In a secret location within Water 7, Robin meets with CP9 members to discuss their plans.
keyEvents.significance: Water 7 serves as the backdrop for Robin's conspiracy with CP9.

keyEvents.title: Robin Announces Her Departure
keyEvents.description: Robin tells Sanji and Chopper across a river in Water 7 that she's leaving the crew.
keyEvents.significance: The city's waterways physically separate Robin from her crewmates during this pivotal moment.
